resources.string: Tour Guide App: Nassau County, NY
Lido Beach is a hamlet and census-designated place in Nassau County, New York, United States.
Tobay Beach is a restricted access recreational beach located in the middle of Jones Beach Island, a barrier island off the South Shore of Long Island, New York in Nassau County
The Clark Botanic Garden is a botanical garden located on Long Island
193 I. U. Willets Rd, Albertson, New York
200-acre property offers a historic mansion amid formal botanical gardens, with daily guided tours.
Former home of Theodore Roosevelt with museum, nature trails, beach and visitor center on 83 acres.
20 Sagamore Hill Rd, Oyster Bay, NY 11771
Large park featuring 5 golf courses, hiking \u0026 biking trails \u0026 picnic facilities.
99 Quaker Meeting House Rd, Farmingdale, NY 11735
Tranquil park with playgrounds, equestrian, biking \u0026 hiking trails \u0026 an old-school wooden carousel
Bayside park with athletic fields \u0026 courts, playgrounds, boat ramps \u0026 a beach on Oyster Bay Harbor.
West End Ave, Oyster Bay, NY 11771
Large green space featuring athletic fields, playgrounds, a fishing pier \u0026 an outdoor pool.
Portuguese rodizio offering sizzling grilled-meat skewers \u0026 other traditional fare.
Sophisticated restaurant offering refined Spanish dishes, including paella, along with sangria.
A Manhattan Little Italy transplant \u0026 bustling old-school spot for fresh seafood \u0026 red-sauce pasta
179 Old Country Rd, Carle Place, NY 11514
Authentic German cuisine, live music \u0026 festivals draw crowds to this historic eatery \u0026 beer garden.
